pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Understand the Responsibilities and Limitations of Using Lucky Voyage Casino Services Lucky Voyage Home About Casino Contact 18+ Disclaimer Welcome aboard the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise in Canada! We are delighted to have you join us for a memorable and exciting experience on the high seas. Before you embark on this journey, we would like to inform you about some important information and guidelines to ensure a safe and enjoyable time for all our guests. Age Restriction: Please be aware that you must be at least 19 years old to participate in any of the gambling activities on board the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise. Valid government-issued photo identification is required for all guests to verify their age before entering the casino area. Responsible Gambling We at "Lucky Voyage" are committed to promoting responsible gambling practices. We encourage our guests to gamble in moderation and to set limits on their spending. Our staff members are trained to assist anyone who may be experiencing problem gambling behavior by providing support, resources, and information on responsible gambling organizations in Canada. Casino Rules and Regulations All guests must adhere to the rules and regulations set forth by the casino on board the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise. These rules are in place to ensure fair play, safety, and security for all guests. Any violation of the rules may result in expulsion from the casino and, in severe cases, expulsion from the cruise itself. Alcohol Consumption Alcoholic beverages are available for purchase on board the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise. We ask that all guests drink responsibly and in moderation. Any guest who is deemed to be intoxicated may be denied further service and may be escorted off the cruise for the safety and well-being of themselves and other guests. Security Measures The safety and security of our guests are of utmost importance to us. We have implemented strict security measures on board the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone. All guests will be required to pass through security screenings before boarding the ship, and random bag checks may be conducted to ensure compliance with our policies. Emergency Procedures In the event of an emergency, all guests are required to follow the instructions of the crew members and casino staff on board the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise. Emergency exits and life-saving equipment are clearly marked throughout the ship for easy identification. We ask that all guests familiarize themselves with the emergency procedures outlined in the ship's safety briefing. Weather Conditions Please be advised that weather conditions on the open sea can be unpredictable. In the event of inclement weather, the captain may alter the cruise itinerary or cancel certain activities for the safety of all guests and crew members. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation in such circumstances. Medical Services Medical services are available on board the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise for any guest who may require assistance. Our trained medical staff is equipped to handle minor medical issues and emergencies. Please inform a crew member immediately if you require medical attention during your cruise. Personal Belongings We advise all guests to keep their personal belongings secure at all times while on board the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise. The casino and cruise line are not responsible for any lost or stolen items. We recommend using the in-room safes provided in your cabin for storing valuable items. Disclaimer of Liability By participating in the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise, all guests acknowledge and accept the inherent risks associated with sea travel and gambling activities. The casino and cruise line shall not be held liable for any loss, injury, or damage sustained by any guest during the cruise, except in cases of negligence on the part of the cruise line. We hope that this disclaimer has provided you with important information about the "Lucky Voyage" casino cruise in Canada. We look forward to welcoming you on board for an unforgettable experience filled with fun, excitement, and of course, a bit of luck! Safe travels, and may you have a fortunate voyage with us! pages.policy: Your Privacy Matters: Read Our Policy to Understand How We Safeguard Your Information at Lucky Voyage Lucky Voyage Home About Casino Contact 18+ Privacy Policy At Lucky Voyage, we are committed to protecting the privacy and confidentiality of our customers' personal information. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our casino-cruise in Canada. Information We Collect: When you visit Lucky Voyage, we may collect personal information such as your name, address, email address, and phone number. We may also collect sensitive information related to your financial transactions, such as credit card details and banking information. This information is collected when you sign up for a membership, participate in our loyalty program, make a reservation, or engage in any other transactions with us. How We Use Your Information: We use the personal information we collect to provide our services to you, including processing your transactions, managing your account, and communicating with you about promotions and events. We may also use your information to improve our services, analyze customer preferences, and personalize your experience on our casino-cruise. Disclosure of Information: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may disclose your information to trusted service providers who assist us in operating our casino-cruise and providing our services to you. These service providers are bound by confidentiality agreements and are only authorized to use your information for the purposes outlined in this privacy policy. Legal Compliance: We may disclose your personal information when required by law or for the purpose of protecting our legal interests. This includes complying with government regulations, responding to legal requests, and enforcing our terms and conditions. Data Security: We take the security of your personal information seriously and have implemented measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. Our website and reservation system are secured with SSL encryption, and we regularly update our security protocols to ensure the safety of your information. Retention of Information: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy. If you no longer wish to have your information stored by us, you may request to have it deleted by contacting our customer service team. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing behavior on our website. This information helps us improve our website functionality, personalize your experience, and track the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect your ability to access certain features on our website. Children's Privacy: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children, and if we become aware that a child has provided us with their information, we will take steps to delete it immediately. Changes to Privacy Policy: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you a notification via email. By continuing to use our services after the changes are made, you agree to the updated privacy policy. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or the way we handle your personal information, please contact our customer service team. We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and ensuring the protection of your privacy while using our casino-cruise in Canada. pages.terms: Terms and Conditions: Your Guide to Enjoying a Safe and Responsible Gaming Experience with Lucky Voyage Lucky Voyage Home About Casino Contact 18+ Terms and Conditions Please read these terms and conditions carefully before booking your ticket for the Lucky Voyage casino cruise in Canada. By booking a ticket, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Ticket Purchase Tickets for the Lucky Voyage casino cruise can be purchased online through our website or at the ticket counter on the day of departure. Tickets are non-transferable and non-refundable. All passengers must be 19 years of age or older to board the cruise. Boarding and Departure Boarding for the Lucky Voyage casino cruise will begin one hour before departure time. Passengers must present a valid government-issued ID and their ticket at the time of boarding. The cruise will depart at the scheduled time, and late passengers will not be accommodated. Casino Games The Lucky Voyage casino cruise offers a variety of casino games, including slots, table games, and poker. All casino games are for entertainment purposes only and do not involve real money gambling. Passengers are expected to follow the rules and regulations of each game and treat other players and staff with respect. Food and Beverage Food and beverage options are available for purchase onboard the Lucky Voyage casino cruise. Passengers are not allowed to bring their own food or beverages onboard. A cash bar is available for passengers to purchase alcoholic beverages. Please drink responsibly. Dress Code Passengers are expected to dress appropriately for the casino cruise. Casual attire is acceptable, but tank tops, flip flops, and shorts are not permitted. Dressing up for the occasion is encouraged, but not required. Safety and Security The safety and security of our passengers are our top priority. All passengers are required to follow the instructions of the crew at all times. Passengers are not allowed to bring any weapons, illegal substances, or other dangerous items onboard the cruise. Smoking is only permitted in designated areas on the cruise ship. Conduct Passengers are expected to conduct themselves in a responsible and respectful manner at all times. Any behavior that is disruptive, offensive, or inappropriate will not be tolerated, and passengers may be asked to leave the cruise. The cruise reserves the right to refuse service to any passenger who violates these terms and conditions. Liability The Lucky Voyage casino cruise and its affiliates are not responsible for any lost or stolen items during the cruise. Passengers participate in all activities on the cruise at their own risk. The cruise is not liable for any injuries or damages incurred during the voyage. Changes and Cancellations The cruise reserves the right to make changes to the schedule, itinerary, or services offered onboard without prior notice. In the event of a cancellation due to unforeseen circumstances, passengers will be notified as soon as possible, and refunds will be issued. Governing Law These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of Canada. Any disputes arising from these terms and conditions will be resolved in accordance with Canadian law. By booking a ticket for the Lucky Voyage casino cruise, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. Thank you for choosing to sail with us on the Lucky Voyage casino cruise and enjoy your journey!
